content: around treble_crochet *chain 1 fpdc around next treble_crochet* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join first chain fasten_off 16 fpdc + 16 chain = 32 yb linen yb linen round 3 join in chain space *fpdc around fpdc bead st in chain space* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join beginning fpdc fasten_off 16 fpdc + 16 beads = 48 clay clay round 4 join in top of double_crochet post of the bead place *2 half_double_crochet in that st 1 half_double_crochet in next st 1 fpdc around fpdc post* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join first half_double_crochet fasten_off 16 fpdc + 48 half_double_crochet = 64 spice spice round 5 join in top of fpdc **single_crochet in fpdc chain 3* repeat ** to * twice fpdc around next fpdc post chain 3** repeat ** to ** three more times slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 12 single_crochet + 4 fpdc + 48 chain = 64 bruschetta bruschetta round 6 join in chain space to the left of a fpdc **5 half_double_crochet in first chain space *skip single_crochet 5 half_double_crochet in next chain space* repeat * to * twice fpdc around fpdc** repeat from ** to ** three times slip_stitch to join first half_double_crochet fasten_off 80 half_double_crochet + 4 fpdc = 84 tobacco round 7 join in half_double_crochet to left of fpdc hdc3l in each of first 5 sts *half_double_crochet in tobacco gap where you skip single_crochet hdc3l in each of next 5 sts* repeat * to * twice ps around the fpdc continue crocheting 5 hdc3l in the half_double_crochet sts half_double_crochet in the gaps and ps around the remaining 3 fpdc slip_stitch to join first hdc3l fasten_off 80 hdc3l + 12 half_double_crochet + 4 ps = 96 mustard be careful not to skip the first half_double_crochet st after the gap it can become buried and easily missed mustard 6 of 9 directions round 8 join in the st to the right of a ps fpdc around ps skip 2 place 6 double_crochet in third hdc3l st skip 2 *fpdc around half_double_crochet skip 2 6 double_crochet in third hdc3l st skip 2* repeat from * to * twice fpdc around the ps continue placing 6 double_crochet in third hdc3l fpdc around half_double_crochet sts and fpdc around psts slip_stitch to first fpdc fasten_off 96 double_crochet + 16 fpdc = 112 wheat round 9 join in fpdc above ps ch2 2dc chain 2 3dc in the fpdc st *chain 5 bpsc around fpdc from r8* repeat from * to * twice **chain 5 3dc chain 2 3dc in next fpdc of a ps** repeat * to * three times repeat ** to ** repeat * to * three times repeat ** to ** repeat * to * wheat three times chain 5 slip_stitch to join chain 2 fasten_off 24 double_crochet + 12 bpsc + 88 chain = 124 viridescent viridescent back round 10 join in corner chain space chain 4 double_crochet in chain space **fpdc around 3 double_crochet
